## AppServices.requestHelp() method

Set the current context-sensitive help content, which the user can see if the global help pane is open.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
requestHelp(key: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
